com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api

Class Crawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.Crawler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrawlerWithSecuredWebApi, CrawlerWithWebApi

    public abstract class Crawler
extends Object
    Provides a skeletal implementation of a crawler to minimize the effort for users to implement their own.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Crawler(CrawlerConfiguration config)
      Base constructor which sets up the crawler with the provided configuration.
      protected Crawler(CrawlerState state)
      Base constructor which restores the crawler to the provided state.

    • Method Detail

      • getCrawlerConfiguration

        public final CrawlerConfiguration getCrawlerConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration of the crawler. This method is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        the configuration of the crawler

      • getCrawlStats

        public final CrawlStats getCrawlStats()
        Returns summary statistics about the crawl progress. This method is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        summary statistics about the crawl progress

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts the crawler. The crawler will use HtmlUnit headless browser to visit URLs. This method will block until the crawler finishes.

      • start

        public final void start(Browser browser)
        Starts the crawler. The crawler will use the specified browser to visit URLs. This method will block until the crawler finishes.
        Parameters:
        browser - the browser type to use for crawling

      • start

        public final void start(Browser browser,
                        org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities capabilities)
        Starts the crawler. The crawler will use the specified browser to visit URLs.
        Parameters:
        browser - the type of the browser to use for crawling
        capabilities - the browser properties

      • getState

        public final CrawlerState getState()
        Returns the current state of the crawler.
        Returns:
        the current state of the crawler

      • resume

        public final void resume()
        Resumes the crawl. The crawler will use HtmlUnit headless browser to visit URLs. This method will block until the crawler finishes.

      • resume

        public final void resume(Browser browser)
        Resumes the crawl. The crawler will use the specified browser to visit URLs. This method will block until the crawler finishes.
        Parameters:
        browser - the type of the browser to use for crawling

      • resume

        public final void resume(Browser browser,
                         org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities capabilities)
        Resumes the crawl. The crawler will use the specified browser to visit URLs. This method will block until the crawler finishes.
        Parameters:
        browser - the type of the browser to use for crawling
        capabilities - the browser properties

      • registerCustomCallback

        protected final <T extends CrawlEvent> void registerCustomCallback(Class<T> eventClass,
                                                                   PatternMatchingCallback<T> callback)
        Registers an operation which is invoked when the specific event occurs and the provided pattern matches the request URL.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the input to the operation
        Parameters:
        eventClass - the runtime class of the event for which the callback should be invoked
        callback - the pattern matching callback to invoke

      • stop

        protected final void stop()
        Gracefully stops the crawler. This method is thread-safe.

      • crawl

        protected final void crawl(CrawlRequest request)
        Feeds a crawl request to the crawler. The crawler should be running, otherwise the request has to be added as a crawl seed instead.
        Parameters:
        request - the crawl request

      • crawl

        protected final void crawl(List<CrawlRequest> requests)
        Feeds multiple crawl requests to the crawler. The crawler should be running, otherwise the requests have to be added as crawl seeds instead.
        Parameters:
        requests - the list of crawl requests

      • downloadFile

        protected final void downloadFile(URI source,
                                  File destination)
                           throws IOException
        Downloads the file specified by the URL.
        Parameters:
        source - the source URL
        destination - the destination file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while downloading the file

      • onBrowserInit

        protected void onBrowserInit(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options options)
        Callback which is used to configure the browser before the crawling begins.
        Parameters:
        options - an interface for managing stuff you would do in a browser menu

        protected void onStart()
        Callback which gets called when the crawler starts.
